name: Prequel
headline: Helping B2B co's sync data to their customers
description: Prequel makes it easy for companies to share data with their customers. It helps you export data directly to your customer's Snowflake, Redshift, BigQuery, Databricks, or other data warehouse on an ongoing basis.

# Your complete data export platform
Give your customers easy access to the data they need. With one simple integration, your customers can schedule data syncs in your app and send data to their platform of choice.
[See demo](https://prequel.co/</demo>)[Contact sales](https://prequel.co/</request-product-demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/67211a5886a0ee61ef1f6056_data-export-platform-home-hero.svg)
###### Product leaders choose Prequel for data export
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/6601f22bd1c80c9714e535dd_zuora.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/6601f22b0f54b3735afe7248_metronome.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/6601f22ba6ef43bc0dcd56da_gong.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/656a78c06d7343c24e08b227_logo-logrocket.svg)
## The best way to build and manage data export products
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/66f329c8838055c02125c765_Frame%20407.svg)
Transfers
### Support every customer with one platform
Prequel is compatible with every major database, data warehouse, and object storage service. Transfer up to 100 million rows per destination, every 15 minutes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/656f50ddae144b573e7c8d99_green-checkmark.svg)
No maintaining pipelines for every platform & region
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/656f50ddae144b573e7c8d99_green-checkmark.svg)
No need to become experts on 20+ platforms
[Explore transfers](https://prequel.co/</data-replication>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/67071c91835e0a30429df186_transfers-support-platform.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/66f329d6da429266c02b532b_icon-account-headshot.svg)
Customer Experience
### Deliver a seamless, native experience
Use our React SDK to embed Prequel in your product. Customers will be able to set up their destination, choose the tables they want, and select their sync frequency.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/656f50ddae144b573e7c8d99_green-checkmark.svg)
Customers get fresh, analysis-ready data
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/656f50ddae144b573e7c8d99_green-checkmark.svg)
No cleaning and parsing required
[Explore customer experience](https://prequel.co/</customer-experience>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/67071c916b94f04ca5cdb39d_seamless-customer-experience.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/66f329d63d82fe00b7a08fce_icon-shield.svg)
Security
### Secure at every step
Data is replicated using ephemeral workers, so no data remains on Prequel’s servers. Prequel can be deployed privately, on our cloud, or using a private cloud.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/656f50ddae144b573e7c8d99_green-checkmark.svg)
Fully encrypted
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/656f50ddae144b573e7c8d99_green-checkmark.svg)
SOC II Type 2 certified
[Explore security](https://prequel.co/</security>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/67071c9190d34e70259e0f69_empemeral-workers-security.svg)
## Give your customers analysis-ready data
Product leaders rely on Prequel to send billions of rows of data to their customers every month.
[ ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd10ccb606ffd/66f33357409fcbe6bc8ebd71_logrocket.svg) “We launched a feature-complete product in one month, from ideation through customer delivery.” ![Jessica Rieger headshot - LogRocket](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd10ccb606ffd/67770189822d2d73853d1e60_67211d202aa00e56c23542df_headshot-jessica-rieger.jpeg) Jessica Rieger Product Manager ](https://prequel.co/</customers/logrocket>)
[ ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd10ccb606ffd/65f8d004af7832544b0b3f0e_modern-treasury-logo.svg) “Thanks to Prequel, we can securely share data with our customers, no matter where they store it.” ![Erica Libby headshot - Modern Treasury](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd10ccb606ffd/67770189a7f4674ff35dc411_67211dee59957f32ef89bab8_headshot-erica-libby-new.jpeg) Erica Libby Product Manager ](https://prequel.co/</customers/modern-treasury>)
[ ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd10ccb606ffd/679010f0c1810a8d2b80fa3c_orb-logo-black.svg) “Customers get a much better experience, and the operational load on our team has decreased tremendously.” ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd10ccb606ffd/67901222fe945c27cfb7d6ae_eric-murphy-orb.jpg) Eric Murphy Engineering Manager ](https://prequel.co/</customers/orb>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/66f329d6da429266c02b532b_icon-account-headshot.svg)
Economics
## Why product leaders build data exports with Prequel
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/66f3671e074e0484591a3ddd_icon-clock.svg)
##### Fastest time to market
With Prequel, you can add 20+ platforms in less time than it would take to integrate with one data warehouse.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/66f3671e58f505a6f7b1b147_icon-teams.svg)
##### Smallest impact on teams
There’s no need to become an expert in dozens of products or build pipelines for each platform and region.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/66f367245cb2687ca4e289e5_icon-charges-dollar.svg)
##### No surprise charges
We charge for destinations, not data. Budgets are more predictable as a result.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/66f3671d4a06f6f4164893c8_icon-server-compute.svg)
##### Optimized compute costs
We invest in tools that help you optimize your source query to minimize compute costs.
## Ready to see Prequel in action?
Watch a short demo or set up time with sales.
[See demo](https://prequel.co/</demo>)[Contact sales](https://prequel.co/</request-product-demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/6604854540b6d26599b72198_post-script-logo-no-bg.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/6601f22bd1c80c9714e535dd_zuora.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/6601f22b0f54b3735afe7248_metronome.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/6601f22ba6ef43bc0dcd56da_gong.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/6601f22bff774a42c607a74b_modern-treasury.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/6601f22b07cd3f3a52c0fb7d_work-ramp.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/6601f22bf83efcb0fc2d2b70_safe-base.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632e1440a7cdd1b2c7606ff6/656a78c06d7343c24e08b227_logo-logrocket.svg)

generated_description:
Prequel is a New York-based startup founded in 2020, backed by Y Combinator's W21 batch. Their mission is straightforward: they help B2B companies efficiently sync data with their customers. Think of it as a bridge that allows businesses to seamlessly export data into their customers' preferred data warehouses—be it Snowflake, Redshift, BigQuery, or Databricks—on an ongoing basis.

With a lean team of nine and guidance from Group Partner Michael Seibel, Prequel has positioned itself as a key player in the SaaS and data engineering sectors. As of their latest announcement, they've successfully raised $5.2 million in seed funding, which is a promising step toward scaling their solution.

What really sets Prequel apart is their platform that simplifies the entire data export process—allowing users to transfer data to any major database and storage service while ensuring the data is always analysis-ready. This capability is especially beneficial for product teams, as they can integrate Prequel’s features into their offerings without bogging themselves down with the technical nitty-gritty associated with multiple data platforms.

Security is another strong focus; their solution ensures that data doesn't linger on Prequel's servers, adhering to SOC II Type II certification standards. This attention to security and user-friendly data access has resonated well with their customers, who report improvements in operational efficiency and user experience.

Prequel's value proposition is compelling: fast deployment, predictable costs (they charge per destination rather than per data transfer), and a streamlined approach to handling vast amounts of data—up to 100 million rows can be transferred every 15 minutes. 

In a world where data is the new oil, Prequel is making it easier for businesses to tap into that resource effectively. You can catch more about their offerings on their website: [prequel.co](https://prequel.co).
